name: Flinthopand Rew
text: If you're in Irivin and you want incredible pizza/italian, go to Blaze PizzaIt's mostly pizza and it's not Irivin  style pizza. Simple but amazing. The funghi pizza rules. Also incredible are these favs: Farro, cucumbers, tomatoes & feta …More

name: Jimmy Anh Truong
text: This place is always busy with customers. I came by just ordered a cheese Pizza for dinner, As usual, I am a meat eater but not tonight because it is an ash Wednesday so I gave up meat for Lent. Their pizzas were ok but I liked the choices …More

name: Joshpin Davidnin
text: Blaze Pizza athin is the best! I love coming here and always get the same g - the delicious Rucola, funghi & Piave salad, the Margherita with mozzarella, tomato & basil, and whatever the seasonal fruit dessert Dahlia has prepared. The …More

name: Josh Rose
text: Normally I love this place and would rate it higher, but a recent experience has me a bit perplexed. They make great pizzas here and I love the variation in toppings offered and the way they cook the pizzas. …More

name: Ethan
text: Place is a joke. Ordered it twice. First time they gave us the wrong pizza. The funny part is, it had the right lid and list of ingredients. Second time the pizzas were so undercooked we could peel the pizza layer by layer. So disappointing.

name: Kathy Shapiro
text: Just treated myself to a pizza from Blaze in Irvine after preparing my meals at home for the past 2 months. The workers were friendly and so generous with toppings. And when I paid, there was no option to add a tip to my payment so I asked …More

name: John Willis
text: This spot constantly delivers. They serve excellent food for convenient pricing, there is no waiting time even when the place is full.

name: Fredrick Chow
text: Blaze is our favorite fast pizza place.  They have lots of toppings to choose from, as well as various crusts. …More

name: Two Fat Meatballs
text: Tables and seats needed to be wiped down, this was at 11am, can only imagine how it looks after the lunch crowd. Took a long time for toppings to be added. Blood orange lemonade is really good. Staff is friendly. Difficult to hear your name being called when order is ready.  Pizza is good, crust is thin and crispy.

name: Mei Deng
text: Really good pizza, came on a Saturday brunch time and there was no line. Staff were very friendly in teaching us how to order. The build your own was a good size to share with someone!

name: Lawrence Abbott
text:
This place is great, nice people, and chill vibes. Kinda noisy, but I was still able to chat with friends and enjoy the vibes.
Making your own pizza here is the best thing you can order, I think. There's so …More

name: Minie Garcia
text: Ben served us today and he is so expedient and professional.

name: M G
text: I ordered my pizza with Claudia and Michael tonight. They both made the experience really nice. Claudia was really patient with my various toppings and took the time to make sure my pizza was made perfectly. I really appreciated how …More

name: Ashley
text: We picked up our order, got home, and found that a pizza was missing. Figured no big deal, we'd just email them asking for a refund for the difference in price. We've emailed twice now with no response, followed up on Twitter where we were told someone would follow up, but nothing. Just all in all a really disappointing experience.

name: JaCoyia Jackson
text: Pizza was great and fun to create. It was also obvious this was a great working atmosphere for the employees,  all friendly, polite and smiling facing. Garlic knots were only okay,  flavor was great but I couldn't get pass the large pieces of garlic all throughout the bread. If you're a garlic lover this will be a bonus I guess.

name: Nina Nina
text: My husband and I come here all the time and Abel, the manager at this location, is absolutely so professional and helpful to us at all times. We are both vegetarian and all the staff go above and beyond in making sure they use a clean …More

name: Kathy Zhuang
text: The pizza is nice and the service is great! Thx Allan for baking the delicious pizza🤣

name: Douglas Scott Hassen
text: Quick counter service. Friendly staff. Made pizza fresh to my custom order.

name: HotHot Tea
text: Im a vegetarian. I ordered a cheese and pineapple pizza. They sent me a PEPPERONI Pizza. I cant even eat that. They dont even have people take a second to check their orders.  I hope I get  my refund. You need better employees.

name: Cris Hazzard
text: Blaze is always good but they can’t keep up with online orders here. If it’s a busy time just come in and order, you’ll get your pizza quicker. Sitting her now going on 50 minutes from my order time.

name: Noe Gaytan
text: Blaze Pizza is a very delicious pizzeria. You start off by choosing your own dough in which they have a variety of. Afterwards you choose your sauce. You’re able to mix and match sauces. You move forward to the cheeses the meats and …More

name: Lauren Bryant
text: They get my order wrong every single time i order pickup. And it's not just like they forget one or 2 things, i just get a completely incorrect order. It's happened about 3 times and at this point i'm over it

name: Ben Treves
text: 5 stars just for the super nice employees

name: Chiva hermano 9
text: Michael cooks them very well i went last week and they were good.

name: Madeline Pan
text: We've been to many Blaze Pizza shops, but this one, across from UCI has the best ingredients. Just warning you though; online orders are filled as they come in and may take precedence over humans waiting to be served. That hugely increases the wait...made me feel secondary.  May order online next time.

name: Faby Moskayra
text:
Delicious pizza!
Excellent customer service.
We didn't wait to long for our pizza:)

name: maddie serpico
text: great thin crust pizza. i love the different toppings and how quick it's out of the oven. thanks!

name: Peter Huettl
text: Amazingly accommodating service and excellent pizza. Easy choice for any and everyone, definitely my go to.

text: Kids favorite pizza place... personalized pizza...my kids never argue about the menu.

"This current place is not taking orders..."

What a bunch of lames.

name: Will Reinkensmeyer
text: Awesome place to eat! Best pizza place because you can customize your pizza with awesome ingredients. I love adding a bunch of different cheeses and veggies. They also have great service and amazing blood orange lemonade! Shout out to Alan, Mike, Tae, Garrick for awesome service!

name: Ayaka Kasahara
text: The pizza was amazing. They also serve very quickly, so you don’t have to wait for long. A very friendly place for new customers, as they explained the system very well. Alan 😀

name: Oscar Gonzalez
text: This was terrific. Kind of hard to mess this up since you are the one that picks the ingredients. …More

name: Trishia S.
text: Great place to eat! Every Blaze Pizza restaurant I’ve been to has delivered good quality food in a convenient amount of time. I’ll definitely be coming back and recommending this place to my buddies. Shoutout to Alan for the awesome service!!

name: Tyla Moody-Moore
text: The pizza is always good, but they should work on customer service. They rush you when making your pizza and talk too quietly to hear over the music and people. Also, there is one employee that is always rude/in a bad mood (she made the pizza in the picture).

name: Vannesa Diaz
text: Service is great (everyone is smiling and laughing) and the food is excellent. I recommend it to everyone! They made my pizza fast and it was delicious! Alan helped me out at the register and was very nice!

name: Kayvon Khorsh
text: Blaze is an awesome company but unfortunately this location is not to standard. Murky atmosphere, unclean, and worst of all, the staff is just playing games on a daily basis. Making pizzas out of order, not on task when there are plenty of …More

name: Karti Tripathi
text: Busy as hell all the time but they're a nice place. Awesome build your own pizza.

name: Michael Quach
text: The workers Mike, Javi, and Sai were nice and helped us out quickly and efficiently!

name: ryanfarns
text: The staff here are extremely hard working and the food quality is exceptional. One of only a few pizza places in irvine worth visiting.

name: Laura Miclat
text: A little busy, since it's close to UCI, but fast and efficient service; great keyo andnlow carb choices for those that are in that diet

name: Manuel ORDAZ
text: Made from scratch to your liking.

name: sabrina murguia
text: Very nice staff amazing food! And Alan was so friendly and nice at the UCI location. Him and the other staff made the experience great I was a first timer and will definitely be back!

name: Rel P
text: Its a friendly place even for newcomers such as myself. They explained how the pizza customization worked and checked if the pizza they made was to my liking. The line was a little long and the pizza takes a little while to cook but thats part of making it. Overall a great place

name: Matia Saeedian
text: I love Blaze pizza. I love stacking my pizzas high, getting almost every topping possible, a little extra bacon, some extra banana peppers. So good. A little extra cheese on top to seal it in too. Only reason I knock one star off here is because the service was quite slow.

name: Kameron Avery
text: The restaurant is great and roomy, the food was delightful and the prices were very reasonable. quick, effective service and very affable waiters. Highly recommended!

name: Stephen Roberts
text: I love this place! The method of cooking pizza is different compared to Pieology or Pizza Rev. Pitfire uses the classical method of cooking Pizza over fire wood. I always customize my pizza which almost goes up to 12-15$ but then I love their shrimp and wood-baked pizza. Very different from over baked.

name: James English
text: This Blaze Pizza is the number one location I always visit. Mayra and Fiona made me a great pizza, everyone ther always pays attention to how much toppings you want and never messes up the order. They even gave me a $2.00 off coupon for …More

name: Brian C
text: Very good. Best value is all toppings.

name: Lisa Chang
text: Cannot comment on the food but we waited in line for 15 minutes just to be cut by a ton of online orders. No one greeted us to assure that we would be helped soon. I would not pay $10 for a personal pizza with this type of service...

name: Sarang Vadali
text: Spicy sauce was amazing!! Perfect pizza made by Claudia.

name: Michelle Machado
text: I ordered 2 pizzas .My husband said his was good but cold.  My pizza was cold and  covered in so much garlic I had to pick it off. I  said no arugula and it was all over my pizza. Wont be ordering from here again.

name: Big Mak
text: Had an amazing BLAZE pizza put together by Alan, Mike, Javier, Claudia.  Very professional and energetic!  Will definitely stop in again, thank you!

name: Adah Delapp
text: Great food and good pricing. The pizzas were cooked perfectly and our sub was the best we have ever had! The girl employee who greeted us was friendly and was happy to help. She checked our food in front of me to make sure it was cooked to order. We will be back!

text: I've only been to this location once so it's hard to say if we just had a bad experience or not. The girl that prepared our pizzas hardly put any ingredients on the pizza, very little sauce, cheese, pepperoni, etc. We had to ask for more of …More

text: Good value for a good pizza. Get a quick pizza your way! I'm always tempted to put to much on my pizza which I always seem to do. I have to remember that sometimes simplicity is best...

text: Great price. Great food. And great service. Blaze knows how to run an awesome restaurant and totally recommend it to anyone who's craving some tasty pizza.

text: Asked for gluten free, cook touched other pizzas before moving mine (and directly touching it). Having celiac I cannot tolerate it. They offered to remake, and the cook dropped another pizza on top of mine after waiting twice as long for …More

text: Love the service here! There is always a warm welcome when walking into this place. The ingredients are fresh.

name: Chris Casas
text: This restaurant must not keep up with their online orders. There's no point in placing an order online, in advance, if the order is not going to be ready by the time given. Probably won't ever be placing another online order here if I have to stand around for an additional 30 minutes for it.

name: Sam Martin
text: Staff was nice dispite being very busy, (line out the door). The pizza was a good deal for the price. And it really didnt take that long to get say maybe 10-12 minuets. Also pretty tasty. Parking was not easy.

text: Make you own. Quick and delicious.

text: Not only do they have gluten free....its soooo soooo!! The crust isn't all chalky or mushy like a lot of other gluten free pizza's, and it doesn't fall apart. I like how fresh the ingredients are and how you can watch them make your own pizza.
